recipe_name: Mustard grilled chicken fillet with chilli and black-eyed bean salad
author: Brian Turner
method: Soak a wooden skewer in cold water for ten minutes.  For the chicken, thread the meat on to the skewer and coat in the mustard. Heat a chargrill pan until smoking and cook the chicken for 3-4 minutes on both sides, or until golden-brown and cooked through.  For the salad, mix all of the salad ingredients in a bowl placed onto a plate. Serve with the chicken on top.
ingredients: 1 chicken fillet,  1 tbsp grain mustard,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp white wine vinegar,  1 red chilli, chopped,  2 tbsp chopped fresh dill,  55g/2oz cooked canned black-eyed beans,  Â¼ banana, peeled, chopped
